|  [deleteStack(request, requestOptions)](./influxdb-client-apis.packagesapi.deletestack.md) |  | Delete a stack and remove all its associated resources. See [https://v2.docs.influxdata.com/v2.0/api/\#operation/DeleteStack](https://v2.docs.influxdata.com/v2.0/api/#operation/DeleteStack) |
|  [exportStack(request, requestOptions)](./influxdb-client-apis.packagesapi.exportstack.md) |  | Export a stack's resources in the form of a package. See [https://v2.docs.influxdata.com/v2.0/api/\#operation/ExportStack](https://v2.docs.influxdata.com/v2.0/api/#operation/ExportStack) |
|  [listStacks(request, requestOptions)](./influxdb-client-apis.packagesapi.liststacks.md) |  | Grab a list of installed Influx packages. See [https://v2.docs.influxdata.com/v2.0/api/\#operation/ListStacks](https://v2.docs.influxdata.com/v2.0/api/#operation/ListStacks) |
|  [readStack(request, requestOptions)](./influxdb-client-apis.packagesapi.readstack.md) |  | Grab a stack by its ID. See [https://v2.docs.influxdata.com/v2.0/api/\#operation/ReadStack](https://v2.docs.influxdata.com/v2.0/api/#operation/ReadStack) |
